title: How AI Is Transforming the Future of Presentation Design
description: Every great idea deserves to be seen — not buried in cluttered slides. Yet for most professionals, building a presentation takes longer than delivering the message itself. title: Global Markets Sway Amid U.S. Shutdown Hopes and AI Fluctuations
description: MSCI's global equities index experienced gains as investors anticipated an end to the U.S. government shutdown. Meanwhile, the U.S. dollar weakened due to labor market concerns, and artificial intelligence stocks saw volatility. Oil and gold prices rose slightly amid economic uncertainty.
